|brand = Ruijie |model = Reyee |submodelappend = yes |submodel = RG-EW3200GX |revision = PRO |subrevision = (v1.00) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2022/04/13 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ruijie/ruijie_rg-ew3200gx_pro |wlclass = AX3200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AX5J-E5 |icid = 2767-E5 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7622BV; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.35 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;WQ25Q128JVSQ;or XMC XM25QH128C; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;MT5CC128M16JR-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531BE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = C4:70:A8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = reyeeOS;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.150.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Reyee_XXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/25/2021 |estreldate = 08/02/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 1B4-0153-001H5 |asin = B09GFP2FHL |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 190 mm × 190 mm × 41 mm |weight = 1.3 kg
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4G~2.4835
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7915AN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2400 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5.150~5.850
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *An Unprecedented Wireless Experience with Wi-Fi 6: This AX3200 Wi-Fi 6 Router offers a dual-band signal, with a 5G transfer rate of 2400Mbps and 2.4G transfer rate of 800Mbps, reducing buffering and latency and enabling seamless roaming *Stronger Signal: This Wi-Fi 6 Mesh Router has 8 omnidirectional antennas equipped with 4+4 high-power FEM amplifiers. Combined with beamforming filtering, the wireless signal coverage is up to 3000 sq. ft. making this computer router a perfect option for large flat spaces, villas, small shops, etc. *Designed for the Multi-user: Under the 802.11ax Wi-Fi standard, this Wi-Fi 6 Mesh Router enables multiple users to share channels and connect up to 128 devices, providing greater network capacity and efficiency in traffic-dense environments *The One-Click Reyee Mesh Advantage: Our advanced Reyee Mesh networking technology allows multiple routers to form a mesh Wi-Fi system, which supports both wired connections and one-click wireless pairing
==Links of Interest== https://www.cnet.com/home/internet/the-best-wi-fi-6-routers-of-2022/
